meanings.sent1: She kept misreferencing the author's name in her essay.
meanings.sent2: He is misreferencing the page numbers in the bibliography.
meanings.sent3: The student's misreferencing of sources led to a confusing research paper.
meanings.sent4: Her constant misreferencing of historical events made her unreliable in discussions.
meanings.sent5: Misreferencing can result in serious academic consequences.

meanings.sent1: They were misreferencing the location of the meeting.
meanings.sent2: The tour guide misreferenced the date of the monument's construction.
meanings.sent3: Misreferencing the wrong person's name can be embarrassing.
meanings.sent4: His misreferencing of the facts caused confusion among the listeners.
meanings.sent5: Avoid misreferencing important details in your presentation.
